SELECT SEQ_EVENT_BOARD.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO EVENT_BOARD (EVENT_ID, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, USERS_ID) VALUES (#{eventId}, #{eventTitle}, #{eventContent}, #{usersId})
mapper.select: SELECT EB.EVENT_ID, EB.EVENT_TITLE, EB.EVENT_UPDATE_AT, EB.EVENT_CONTENT, U.USERS_ID, EI.EVENT_IMG_ID, EI.EVENT_ORIGINAL_FILENAME, EI.EVENT_UUID, EI.EVENT_PATH, EI.EVENT_EXTENSION FROM EVENT_BOARD EB JOIN USERS U ON EB.USERS_ID = U.USERS_ID LEFT JOIN EVENT_IMG EI ON EB.EVENT_ID = EI.EVENT_ID ORDER BY EVENT_ID DESC

SELECT EB.EVENT_ID, EB.EVENT_TITLE, EB.EVENT_UPDATE_AT, EB.EVENT_CONTENT, U.USERS_ID, EI.EVENT_IMG_ID, EI.EVENT_ORIGINAL_FILENAME, EI.EVENT_UUID, EI.EVENT_PATH, EI.EVENT_EXTENSION FROM EVENT_BOARD EB JOIN USERS U ON EB.USERS_ID = U.USERS_ID LEFT JOIN EVENT_IMG EI ON EB.EVENT_ID = EI.EVENT_ID WHERE EB.EVENT_ID = #{eventId}
